Sinopse: Doting Sean duly worries when his pregnant wife, GP Candace, seems to expect too much from the search for her biological parents. A DNA test on Internet enables tracking down her father, tycoon Tom Mason, but he denies and threatens with legal action if she ever approaches him, wife Jeanette or sons and junior executives Alex and Bruce. Shortly after, people get killed who either help Candace or are linked to the presumed murder of her mother Henrietta. By the time Tom and she realize Jeannette is behind it, she kidnapped Candace.—KGF Vissers
